H3.text: when is season 8 for game of thrones. 2019

A4.text: The eighth and final season of the fantasy drama television series Game of Thrones, produced by HBO, premiered on April 14, 2019, and concluded on May 19, 2019.

A5.text: The season premiered on April 14, 2019, in the United States on HBO.
